doc.name: TextStyle
doc.description: This attribute annotates user settable attributes to specify an arbitrary multi-line text area style for configuring the containing attribute. This style can be used with any Settable attribute.
doc.author: Zoltan Kemenczy, Research in Motion Ltd
doc.property: The height (in lines) of the text box. This is an integer that defaults to 10.
The width (in characters) of the text box. This is an integer that defaults to 30.
